value.name: ‘It’s a reasonable request’: Parents continue to push for changes to CMS policy on performing arts
value.description: Parents are now asking why. “A live performance with an audience who pays to come see them, that’s their big game, that’s their playoff and they’re being cheated out of it this year,” said Angie Hall, whose daughter is in the musical.

value.name: Law forcing election cycle delay not a given
value.description: Tar Heel: For mayor, seat occupied by Sam Allen; for commissioner, seats occupied by Michael Underwood, Angie Hall and Derek Druzak. —White Lake: For commissioner, seats occupied by Mike Suggs, Tim Blount and Paul Evans. Filing in Bladen County remains ...

value.name: Alumni in the news & newsletters
value.description: Our alumni are doing amazing things in the world. Learn more by viewing the current alumni eNewsletter and by looking at some of the stories below featuring their accomplishments and updates.
